restaurants.name: Dominos
restaurants.description: Domino's! A popular international pizza chain known its wide range of pizza flavors and convenient delivery services. Founded in 1960 by Tom Monaghan and James Monaghan, Domino's has grown to become one of the largest pizza chains in the world, with over 15,000 stores across more than 85 countries. The company is famous for its "30-minute delivery guarantee" and has introduced various innovations
